ssot__LoyaltyTierGroup__dlm.name: Loyalty Tier Group
ssot__LoyaltyTierGroup__dlm.description: The Loyalty Tier Group DMO represents loyalty programs that have multiple tiers of benefits. Tiers can be organized based on objectives, such as lifetime, marketing, or regular.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: A description of the loyalty program tier group.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to a business unit or other internal organization that owns a business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator of whether the loyalty tier group is active.

ssot__IsExtendedToEndOfMonth__c.description: An indicator that determines if the benefit expiration date is extended to the last date of the month.

ssot__IsHiddenToMembers__c.description: An indicator that determines the visibility of the Loyalty Tier Group to the members of the loyalty program.

ssot__IsPrimary__c.description: An indicator that determines if the loyalty tier group is the primary tier group for the loyalty program.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to a marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to shop at or use the services of business associated with the program.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID that is used as the primary key for the Loyalty Tier Group DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyTierModelId__c.description: A reference ID to the tier model used for processing, either fixed or anniversary.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the loyalty program tier group.

ssot__QualifyingPointsResetDate__c.description: The date when the qualifying points are to be reset.

ssot__QualifyingPointsResetFrequencyNumb.description: The unit of measure for the reset period between qualifying points resets. For example, the number of months between a reset.

ssot__QualifyingPointsResetPeriodUOM__c.description: The measure of time between resets of qualifying points, for example monthly or yearly.

ssot__TierPeriodTimeUOM__c.description: The measure of time between processing of tiers, for example monthly or yearly.

ssot__TierTimePeriodQuantity__c.description: The number of time units that between processing of tiers within the loyalty tier group.
